title: Cgpa in 7th and 8th sem
content:
If i got x gpa by 6th sem. How much will I be able to increase in the 7th and 8th sem by getting internship and capstone credits. 


Can you brief out what 7th and 8th sem will look like

comments.body: Can't really improve much, maximum improvement would be by 0.25 in each semester.That's only if your current cgpa is really low and u end up scoring 9.5+ in 7th and 8th sem.

Even if you score 10 sgpa in both 7 and 8th sem, there won't be much increase in your CGPA(~0.25‚è´ you can expect that's it). The CGPA until your 6th semester is what decides your CGPA while you pass out of college.
Biotech: 7th sem had two subjects plus capstone, 8th sem had one internship (If paid you get 6 credits, if unpaid you get 4 credits plus a special topic for two credits), capstone.
